name: Word Puzzles by POWGI
description:
Enjoy more great POWGI word puzzles with this bumper collection of six favorite word games.

The puzzles included are:

Word Maze

Like a wiggly word search! Find the words and solve the maze!

Mixups

A fiendishly difficult anagram puzzle with three words all jumbled together!

One Word

The word search puzzle where there's only one word to find!

Flowers

Plant pairs of letters around the flower to grow six words with a common middle.

Circles

Three overlapping circles hide three connected words. Find the missing letter to unscramble them all!

Crossovers

Crossword puzzles with only one letter missing, which come together to solve a clue!

POWGI puzzles are all expertly hand-crafted for your enjoyment and puzzling pleasure!
